extraDescription: EI Service Delivery Modernization: The assigned resource shall: a?c Assist the Business architecture team in identifying an appropriate structure for process roles a?c Finalize a process classification framework adapted to ESDC's benefit processing programs, leveraging industry practices a?c Identify process groups requiring modeling, in preparation for EI Service Delivery Modernization planning phase a?c Work collaboratively with the Business architecture team to consolidate existing process artefacts into IGrafx a?c Recommend a set of standardized process model views, prioritized according to transformation stages.
